OutcomePoint.description:
Base class for outcome points.

Defines specific coordinates within an outcome space that identify a particular
product instance. Outcome points specify the exact parameters that distinguish
one product from others in the same outcome space family.

fsp_type.description: Type of Final Settlement Price: 'scalar' for continuous values, 'binary' for 0/1 outcomes, 'ternary' for 0/0.5/1 outcomes
fsp_type.title: Fsp Type

OutcomePoint.title: OutcomePoint

TemporalObservation.description:
Temporal coordinates identifying a specific time series observation.

A temporal observation is a single point in a time series, characterized by
when the observation occurred (reference_date) and when it was published
(release_date). This represents one dimension in the outcome space.

reference_date.description: Date of the observation period (ISO 8601: YYYY-MM-DD). For monthly data: first day of month. For quarterly: first day of quarter. For yearly: January 1st.
reference_date.title: Reference Date

release_date.description: Date when the value is officially released/published (ISO 8601: YYYY-MM-DD). Used when products track specific data releases.
release_date.title: Release Date

TemporalObservation.title: TemporalObservation

description:
Outcome point for time series outcome spaces.

Specifies which temporal observation this product tracks. This is a
one-dimensional outcome point where the dimension is temporal.

fsp_type.description: Type of Final Settlement Price: must be 'scalar' for time series outcome points
fsp_type.title: Fsp Type

observation.description: The temporal observation being tracked (one dimension)
